data.name: Product Showcase
data.description: Highlight product features with dynamic visuals and clear benefits
data.recommendedUseCase: E-commerce listings, product launches, feature highlights

defaults.title: Product Showcase
defaults.prompt: Create a product showcase video for {product}. Highlight key features, benefits, and what makes it unique.
